thread.title: PrismHR Unveils New Sales and Marketing Acceleration Program for PEOs and ASOs
thread.title_full: PrismHR Unveils New Sales and Marketing Acceleration Program for PEOs and ASOs

author: Keith Knowles
title: PrismHR Unveils New Sales and Marketing Acceleration Program for PEOs and ASOs
text:
Today at the NAPEO 2015 Annual Conference & Marketplace in Phoenix, Arizona, PrismHR, the leading provider of cloud-based HR software for Professional Employment Organizations (PEOs) and Administrative Services Organizations (ASOs), launched a new program to help PrismHR customers market and sell PEO technology and services. The new program, called SEEDS, provides tools to communicate the true business impact of PrismHR to PEO and ASO clients. SEEDS includes templated content, including datasheets and demos, to help market and sell PrismHR enabled services. SEEDS is open to all sales and marketing professionals and executives of any PrismHR customer.
“Our customers have asked for sales and marketing support and we’re thrilled to deliver the SEEDS program today,” said Gary Noke, President and CEO, PrismHR. “The launch of SEEDS is a first step to help our customers prosper, not just through great technology, but also through innovative programs that enable them to accelerate their growth. We’re devoting significant resources to this program and it is yet another example of our commitment to help our customers improve their businesses.”
“PEOs and ASOs are seeing increased competition for their prospects and customers, and how you position technology within the sales process is critical to winning new business,” commented Ray Dile, Principal, Pathway Strategies. “Every PEO can improve how they communicate the business value of technology, and this new offering will quickly become required education for PrismHR customers to help improve close ratios and acquire new clients.”
“SEEDS is a key resource to fuel our growth. We are experts in selling HR services, not technology,” noted Doug Snowman, President, Payplans and Benefits. “The content and resources from SEEDS will significantly streamline and simplify our sales and marketing, while also increasing its effectiveness.”
SEEDS is currently free for all PrismHR customers. To register for access to SEEDS, sign up at http://www.prismhr.com/seeds .
About PrismHR
PrismHR creates exceptional software and services, empowering Professional Employer Organizations (PEOs) and Administrative Service Organizations (ASOs) to deliver world-class HR, benefits and payroll to small and medium businesses. The PrismHR Platform powers more than 58,000 organizations, delivering payroll, benefits and HR to more than 1.35 million worksite employees, and processing more than $39 billion in payroll each year. For more information, visit http://www.prismhr.com .
